survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant Care Subscription Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use plant care subscription services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through your subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through your subscription?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the subscription service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the subscription service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our plant care subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended for qualitative feedback. Keep the field large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our plant care subscription service?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the plants delivered (e.g., damaged, unhealthy)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to gauge problem occurrence.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the plants delivered (e.g., damaged, unhealthy)?
